mapper.select: select member_id userId, member_pw userPw, member_name userName , member_email userEmail, 'mem' grade from members where member_id = #{userId} and MEMBER_EMAIL_CONF is not null union select emp_id, emp_pw, emp_name, emp_email, 'emp' grade from employees where emp_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update members set MEMBER_EMAIL_CONF = 'Y' where MEMBER_ID = #{userId} and MEMBER_EMAIL_CONF is null
